data.eml:eml: Two new marine flatworms (Polycladida: Pseudocerotidae) from Andaman & Nicobar Islands, India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dixit, Sudhanshu, Raghunathan, C., Chandra, Kailash (2017): Two new marine flatworms (Polycladida: Pseudocerotidae) from Andaman & Nicobar Islands, India. Zootaxa 4221 (1): 111-122, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.246774
